title: Verify custom redirect links works with browser based natification
custom_steps: 1. Enabled below feature flag from webui pod: MariaDB [(none)]> UPDATE tenant6258db.global_vars SET var_value=1 WHERE var_name='once_escaped_notification'; 2. Created UJ template template with hyperlink in it and check version for tempate on nsproxy href="https://pgone.sharepoint.com/:b:/r/sites/WISE/Info%20Assets%20Classification/2%20Standards/Information%20Asset%20Handling%20and%20Protection%20Standard%20for%20End%20User.pdf?csf=1&web=1&e=BN0Tea">View Standard 3. Use custom template with Box app 4. Upload a file and click on link. 5. Make sure link redirects to appropriate url with browser based notification
